headline: FTC to Review Omnicom Group’s Acquisition of The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (IPG)
summary: As a leader in the advertising and marketing services sector, The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (NYSE:IPG) remains one of the best marketing stocks to buy right now. On June 12, 2025, it was reported that the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) may restrict the merged entity of Omnicom Group-The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. […]
